files.patch:
@@ -12,1 +12,1 @@
-        default: "Linux multiple (hotspot only), Linux x64, Linux x86, Windows x64, macOS x64"
+        default: "Linux additional (hotspot only), Linux x64, Linux x86, Windows x64, macOS x64"
@@ -21,1 +21,1 @@
-      platform_linux_x64_hotspot_only: ${{ steps.check_platforms.outputs.platform_linux_x64_hotspot_only }}
+      platform_linux_additional: ${{ steps.check_platforms.outputs.platform_linux_additional }}
@@ -36,1 +36,1 @@
-          echo "::set-output name=platform_linux_x64_hotspot_only::${{ contains(github.event.inputs.platforms, 'linux multiple (hotspot only)') || (github.event.inputs.platforms == '' && (secrets.JDK_SUBMIT_PLATFORMS == '' || contains(secrets.JDK_SUBMIT_PLATFORMS, 'linux multiple (hotspot only)'))) }}"
+          echo "::set-output name=platform_linux_additional::${{ contains(github.event.inputs.platforms, 'linux additional (hotspot only)') || (github.event.inputs.platforms == '' && (secrets.JDK_SUBMIT_PLATFORMS == '' || contains(secrets.JDK_SUBMIT_PLATFORMS, 'linux additional (hotspot only)'))) }}"
@@ -105,1 +105,1 @@
-    if: needs.prerequisites.outputs.should_run != 'false' && (needs.prerequisites.outputs.platform_linux_x64 != 'false' || needs.prerequisites.outputs.platform_linux_x64_hotspot_only == 'true')
+    if: needs.prerequisites.outputs.should_run != 'false' && (needs.prerequisites.outputs.platform_linux_x64 != 'false' || needs.prerequisites.outputs.platform_linux_additional == 'true')
@@ -380,2 +380,2 @@
-  linux_x64_hotspot_only:
-    name: Linux multiple
+  linux_additional_build:
+    name: Linux additional
@@ -386,1 +386,1 @@
-    if: needs.prerequisites.outputs.should_run != 'false' && needs.prerequisites.outputs.platform_linux_x64_hotspot_only != 'false'
+    if: needs.prerequisites.outputs.should_run != 'false' && needs.prerequisites.outputs.platform_linux_additional != 'false'
@@ -488,1 +488,1 @@
-        run: sudo apt-get install gcc-10-${{ matrix.gnu-arch}}-linux-gnu${{ matrix.gnu-flavor}}=10.2.0-5ubuntu1~20.04cross1 g++-10-${{ matrix.gnu-arch}}-linux-gnu${{ matrix.gnu-flavor}}=10.2.0-5ubuntu1~20.04cross1
+        run: sudo apt-get install gcc-10-${{ matrix.gnu-arch }}-linux-gnu${{ matrix.gnu-flavor}}=10.2.0-5ubuntu1~20.04cross1 g++-10-${{ matrix.gnu-arch }}-linux-gnu${{ matrix.gnu-flavor}}=10.2.0-5ubuntu1~20.04cross1
@@ -495,2 +495,2 @@
-          path: ~/sysroot-${{ matrix.debian-arch}}/
-          key: sysroot-${{ matrix.debian-arch}}-${{ hashFiles('jdk/.github/workflows/submit.yml') }}
+          path: ~/sysroot-${{ matrix.debian-arch }}/
+          key: sysroot-${{ matrix.debian-arch }}-${{ hashFiles('jdk/.github/workflows/submit.yml') }}
@@ -506,1 +506,1 @@
-          --arch=${{ matrix.debian-arch}}
+          --arch=${{ matrix.debian-arch }}
@@ -511,1 +511,1 @@
-          ~/sysroot-${{ matrix.debian-arch}}
+          ~/sysroot-${{ matrix.debian-arch }}
@@ -517,3 +517,3 @@
-          sudo chroot ~/sysroot-${{ matrix.debian-arch}} symlinks -cr .
-          sudo chown ${USER} -R ~/sysroot-${{ matrix.debian-arch}}
-          rm -rf ~/sysroot-${{ matrix.debian-arch}}/{dev,proc,run,sys}
+          sudo chroot ~/sysroot-${{ matrix.debian-arch }} symlinks -cr .
+          sudo chown ${USER} -R ~/sysroot-${{ matrix.debian-arch }}
+          rm -rf ~/sysroot-${{ matrix.debian-arch }}/{dev,proc,run,sys}
@@ -524,3 +524,3 @@
-          echo "CC=${{ matrix.gnu-arch}}-linux-gnu${{ matrix.gnu-flavor}}-gcc-10" >> $GITHUB_ENV
-          echo "CXX=${{ matrix.gnu-arch}}-linux-gnu${{ matrix.gnu-flavor}}-g++-10" >> $GITHUB_ENV
-          echo "cross_flags=--openjdk-target=${{ matrix.gnu-arch}}-linux-gnu${{ matrix.gnu-flavor}} --with-sysroot=${HOME}/sysroot-${{ matrix.debian-arch}}/ --with-toolchain-path=${HOME}/sysroot-${{ matrix.debian-arch}}/ --with-freetype-lib=${HOME}/sysroot-${{ matrix.debian-arch}}/usr/lib/${{ matrix.gnu-arch}}-linux-gnu${{ matrix.gnu-flavor}}/ --with-freetype-include=${HOME}/sysroot-${{ matrix.debian-arch}}/usr/include/freetype2/ --x-libraries=${HOME}/sysroot-${{ matrix.debian-arch}}/usr/lib/${{ matrix.gnu-arch}}-linux-gnu${{ matrix.gnu-flavor}}/" >> $GITHUB_ENV
+          echo "CC=${{ matrix.gnu-arch }}-linux-gnu${{ matrix.gnu-flavor}}-gcc-10" >> $GITHUB_ENV
+          echo "CXX=${{ matrix.gnu-arch }}-linux-gnu${{ matrix.gnu-flavor}}-g++-10" >> $GITHUB_ENV
+          echo "cross_flags=--openjdk-target=${{ matrix.gnu-arch }}-linux-gnu${{ matrix.gnu-flavor}} --with-sysroot=${HOME}/sysroot-${{ matrix.debian-arch }}/ --with-toolchain-path=${HOME}/sysroot-${{ matrix.debian-arch }}/ --with-freetype-lib=${HOME}/sysroot-${{ matrix.debian-arch }}/usr/lib/${{ matrix.gnu-arch }}-linux-gnu${{ matrix.gnu-flavor}}/ --with-freetype-include=${HOME}/sysroot-${{ matrix.debian-arch }}/usr/include/freetype2/ --x-libraries=${HOME}/sysroot-${{ matrix.debian-arch }}/usr/lib/${{ matrix.gnu-arch }}-linux-gnu${{ matrix.gnu-flavor}}/" >> $GITHUB_ENV
@@ -532,1 +532,1 @@
-          --with-conf-name=linux-x64-hotspot
+          --with-conf-name=linux-${{ matrix.gnu-arch }}-hotspot
@@ -544,1 +544,1 @@
-        run: make CONF_NAME=linux-x64-hotspot
+        run: make CONF_NAME=linux-${{ matrix.gnu-arch }}-hotspot
@@ -1450,1 +1450,1 @@
-      - linux_x64_hotspot_only
+      - linux_additional_build
